entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 1 "New Friends"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 1 "New Friends"
media:group.media:description:
Do you like to have company come to dinner? A long time ago some people were just learning about Jesus. Let's imagine how one little girl and her family shared with them.
"They shared everything they had." ACTS 4:32, NIV.
God's children share what they have.
More at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 2 "Seven Special Helpers"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 2 "Seven Special Helpers"
media:group.media:description:
Do you like working with your mom or dad while you make a cake or wash the car? It's more fun to share the work. A long time ago some people were chosen to help the apostles in a special way.
"Share with God's people who need help." ROMANS 12:13 ICB
God's people work together to help others.
More at http://www.gracelink.net/​kindergarten
Tell the story with our iPad at http://itunes.apple.com/​us/​app/​gracelink/​id468705054?mt=8

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 3 "Two Men And A Strange Message"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 3 "Two Men And A Strange Message"
media:group.media:description:
"God does not show favoritism." ACTS 10:34, NIV. Who preaches in your church each Sabbath? Peter was used to preaching about Jesus only to the Jews. But God had other plans for him.
God's children can be friends to everyone.
More at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten
Tell a story with our iPad at http://itunes.apple.com/​us/​app/​gracelink/​id468705054?mt=8

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 4 "In And Out Of Prison"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 4 "In And Out Of Prison"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever known someone who was in trouble? How could you help them? Peter's friends prayed and prayed and prayed for him, and something amazing happened.
"The church kept on praying to God for him." ACTS 12:5, ICB.
In God's family we pray for one another.
See Also: http://www.gracelink.net/kindergarten
or the iPad storytelling app http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/gracelink/id468705054?mt=8

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 5 "Helping Hands"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 5 "Helping Hands"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever done something really nice for someone? How did you make them feel? How did you feel? Dorcas did many kind deeds for others, and God cared for her in an amazing way. "Being kind to the needy brings happiness." PROVERBS 14:21, ICB. Being kind to others makes us happy too.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 6 "A Blind Man Learns To Lead"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 6 "A Blind Man Learns To Lead"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever had to go a different way because the road was blocked? You had to take a detour. God once led Saul on a "detour." "The Lord . . . has sent me so that you may see again." ACTS 9:17, NIV. God leads us to serve others.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 7 "Come To My House"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 7 "Come To My House"
media:group.media:description:
"Come and stay at my house." ACTS 16:15, NIV. We serve God when we take care of others.
Do you like to visit other people's homes? Do you like to have people come to your house? When Lydia found out about Jesus, she invited some new friends to stay with her.
more at
http://www.gracelink.net/kindergarten

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 8 "Prison Praises"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 8 "Prison Praises"
media:group.media:description:
Paul and Silas were in jail. They could easily have grumbled and complained, but they loved Jesus and did some things very differently. Let's see how they shared Jesus.
"Do what is right." 2 CORINTHIANS 8:21, NIV.
We share Jesus by doing what is right
more at
www.gracelink.net/kindergarten

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 9 "Shipwrecked"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever been on a boat? Was the water calm or choppy? Paul and his friends were on a boat in a bad storm, and something terrible happened.
"Encourage one another and build each other up." 1 THESSALONIANS 5:11, NIV.
We serve others when we encourage them.
More at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 10 "God's Word"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 10 "God's Word"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever had someone read to you, but you didn't understand what they were saying? A long time ago an important man was reading God's Word, but he didn't understand it. Who could help him?
"Let your word help me understand." Psalm 119:169 ICB
God helps us understand His Word.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 11 "God's Messengers"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 11 "God's Messengers"
media:group.media:description:
Do you like to hear good news? A long time ago angels brought good news to some special people.
"The angels . . . serve God and are sent to help." HEBREWS 1:14, ICB. God sends angels to help us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 12 "The Best Gift"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 12 "The Best Gift"
media:group.media:description:
Can you think of the best gift you've ever received? Were you excited? Is that the way you feel about Jesus, the really, truly best gift ever?
"Today . . . a Savior has been born." LUKE 2:11, NIV.
Jesus is the best gift from God.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 13 "Dedicated to God"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 13 "Dedicated to God"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever seen a baby dedication in church? Were you dedicated to God? Jesus was.
"Children are a gift from the Lord." PSALM 127:3, ICB.
God shares His gift with everyone.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 14 "He's Coming Again"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 4 Episode 14 "He's Coming Again"
media:group.media:description: Do you get excited when special people come to take you someplace? Soon a very special person will come for you. He will take you to His home. "Look, he is coming with the clouds" REVELATION 1:7, NIV. Jesus is coming soon!
